name: Stuck in INFINITY
description:
MECHANICS

Everytime you move, you spend some energy. Go near the energy sources to replenish your energy and connect to them. When you have connected to all the sources, you move to the next round. If you run out of energy before connecting to all, you will lose the game. Good Luck!

This game is a submission to GMTK Game Jam 2021.

If you enjoyed this and want to see more of our games, be sure to hop onto our discord server!
